solution_line_template: He needs {flour_scoops} scoops of flour because {flour_cups} / ({scoop_size}) = <<{flour_cups}/({scoop_size})={flour_scoops}>>{flour_scoops}
He needs {sugar_scoops} scoops of sugar because {sugar_cups} / ({scoop_size}) = <<{sugar_cups}/({scoop_size})={sugar_scoops}>>{sugar_scoops}
